request.description: Register a resource by its metadata.

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--
Copyright (c) 2021 T-Systems International GmbH (Catena-X Consortium)

See the AUTHORS file(s) distributed with this work for additional
information regarding authorship.

See the LICENSE file(s) distributed with this work for
additional information regarding license terms.
-->
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <groupId>net.catenax</groupId>
    <artifactId>data</artifactId>
    <version>latest</version>
    <name>Catena-X Test Data Module</name>
    <description>All code related to managing test data</description>
    <properties>
        <java.version>11</java.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>11</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>11</maven.compiler.target>
    </properties>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
			<groupId>com.microsoft.azure</groupId>
			<artifactId>azure-storage</artifactId>
			<version>8.6.6</version>
		</dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.json</groupId>
            <artifactId>json</artifactId>
            <version>20210307</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
        <plugin>
        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <phase>package</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>single</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
        <configuration>
          <descriptorRefs>
            <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
          </descriptorRefs>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>		
      </plugins> 
    </build>
</project>

request.description: Get the resource's representation by its uuid.

query.description: (Required) The URI of the requested IDS connector.
(Required) The URI of the requested artifact.

request.description:
Send a contract request to another IDS connector.
Put the contract delivered by "6" into the body.

query.description: (Required) The URI of the requested IDS connector.
The URI of the requested resource.

request.description: Request metadata from another IDS connector.

query.description: (Required) The URI of the requested IDS connector.
(Required) The URI of the requested artifact.
The URI of the contract agreement.
(Required) A unique validation key.

request.description:
Request data from another IDS connector. 
Put in the contract agreement from 7 into "transferContract" param.
Put in the validation token from 8 into "key" param.

response.name: Artifact Request

query.description: (Required) The URI of the requested IDS connector.
(Required) The URI of the requested artifact.
The URI of the contract agreement.
(Required) A unique validation key.

response.body: Your key is not valid. Please request metadata first.

request.description: Get a resource's data as a string.

Invokes the Root URL of the connector server.
Should provide the connector config.
Currently works only without authentication which is strange.

Invokes the Root URL of the connector server.
Should provide the connector config.
Currently works only without authentication which is strange.

item.name: 2 - Create a Contract in Provider (which enables Consumer)

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Sample Contract",
    "description": "A sample contract between two parties.",
    "consumer": "{{consumer-id}}",
    "provider": "{{provider-id}}",
    "start": "2021-01-01T18:35:29.921Z",
    "end": "2021-12-31T07:11:13.569Z"
}

{
    "title": "Sample Data Source",
    "description": "A sample data source as provided by a business partner",
    "keywords": [
        "Sample",
        "Data Provider"
    ],
    "publisher": "http://catena-x.net",
    "language": "multiple",
    "license": "https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html",
    "sovereign": "http://t-systems.com",
    "endpointDocumentation": "",
    "sample": "http://catena-x.net/resources/sample#1",
    "paymentMethod": "free"
}

request.description:
Creates a fresh sample resource with a fixed id.
"sample" is not really used in the server model but validated in the JSON payload!
"samples" on the other hand should be used in the server model but invokes an error on the JSON side!

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <groupId>net.catenax</groupId>
    <artifactId>data</artifactId>
    <version>latest</version>
    <name>Catena-X Test Data Module</name>
    <description>All code related to managing test data</description>
    <properties>
        <java.version>11</java.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>11</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>11</maven.compiler.target>
    </properties>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
			<groupId>com.microsoft.azure</groupId>
			<artifactId>azure-storage</artifactId>
			<version>8.6.6</version>
		</dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.json</groupId>
            <artifactId>json</artifactId>
            <version>20210307</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
        <plugin>
        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <phase>package</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>single</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
        <configuration>
          <descriptorRefs>
            <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
          </descriptorRefs>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>		
      </plugins> 
    </build>
</project>
